attributes.action: Stop Morecambe Bay Health Trust from taking all the Health Care away from The South Lakes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Morecambe bay health trust have done nothing but drain the south lakes of money and services. They have even cut down services at helme chase even after they won best in country. Now why do we have a hospital with so many closed wards we have raised money for wards that have never been opened. How many people have to die on the way to lancaster before we our services back.
